sentence.Network_en: The noble, Dracon, was asked to codify the laws.
sentence.Network_cn: 贵族德拉古被选为立法者.

sentence.Network_en: The new government promised to codify the laws.
sentence.Network_cn: 新政府应允要编纂法典。

sentence.Network_en: We will codify a new technique.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们将引进一种新技术.

codger 怪癖的人codifiability 编码可能性codification 编纂
当判例发展到一定程度后，判例开始被“法典化”（codified），即被纳入制定法。同时，由奥立佛•霍姆斯大法官、卡尔•卢埃林教授和其 …
一种是可编码知识(codified knowledge)，信息(information)就是这一类知识。信息是容易编码并具有单独的含义且能释义的。
显性知识又称编码化知识（codified knowledge），是可以比较容易地整理、编码，具有单一的含义和内容。缄默知识是很难编码、隐 …

entry.tran: 编纂;整理;将(法规等)整理成典
entry.def: If you codify a set of rules, you define them or present them in a clear and ordered way.

example.ex: The latest draft of the agreement codifies the panel's decision.
example.tran: 最新的协议草案把专家小组的决定加以整理，形成了条文。

means.word_mean: 1. organize into a code or system, such as a body of law;

auth_sentence.content: The new guidelines codify the mantra when in doubt, sit it out.
auth_sentence.res_content: The new guidelines codify the mantra when in doubt, sit it out.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The new guidelines codify the mantra when in doubt, sit it out.

auth_sentence.content: It is very difficult to codify the rules, and therefore tricky to develop reliable EHR access control algorithms.
auth_sentence.res_content: It is very difficult to codify the rules, and therefore tricky to develop reliable EHR access control algorithms.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: It is very difficult to codify the rules, and therefore tricky to develop reliable EHR access control algorithms.

auth_sentence.content: "The Iraqi parliament will convene again in early September and it will need to act to codify this political progress," he said.
auth_sentence.res_content: "The Iraqi parliament will convene again in early September and it will need to act to codify this political progress," he said.
